item.title: Publishing Data to the Web with Heroku and Datasette
item.description: Please note that this course website is equipped with the Hypothes.is annotation layer. If you are not on the list or you’re listed in the wrong place, please highlight the relevant text and leave an annotation in our class Hypothesis group to alert me. Prerequisites You need to have the following installed on your machine: Python. I recommend using Anaconda to manage all of your python related work. Get Anaconda here and get the 3.
